name: I stepped on a piece of gum on the sidewalk but actually it's an ailen army??!?
name_original: I stepped on a piece of gum on the sidewalk but actually it's an ailen army??!?
description:
Surprise! A space-foreign entity has arrived on our planet, ready to conquer the earth! 

Play as the ever brave ailen leading an army of goo lads underneath the unsuspecting humans' very feet!

Collect enough organic matter to fuel your plot to take over the world!

WIP !

[Windows only for now- sorry!]

WASD to move, left click to toss the Goomins, right click to call them back.

Programming by Justin Kyle Torres

Music & Sound Design by Corrin Coffrey

3D Assets by Quaternius
